description: This file defines a lightweight ViewModel-like class for managing the state of a login screen within an Android application. It implements observer registration, state management, and dispatching of login intents, with simulated side-effects for login process handling.

classes.name: LoginViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel-like class for managing login screen state, observing changes, and dispatching login intents.

methods.name: observe
methods.description: Registers an observer callback to be notified on every state update. Immediately calls the observer with the current state.

methods.name: removeObserver
methods.description: Removes a previously registered observer callback.

methods.name: dispatch
methods.description: Handles login intents, updates state via reducer, and manages side-effects such as simulated authentication.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Updates the current login state and notifies observers on the main thread.

methods.name: notifyObservers
methods.description: Invokes all registered observer callbacks with the latest login state.
